name: To Do List Application
desc: The To-Do App helps users manage tasks. It uses HTML5, CSS3, JS, and Flask for features like adding, removing, filtering, and marking tasks as done.

name: India Covid-19 Cases Data Analysis
desc: Analyzing confirmed, death, and recovery cases in Maharashtra, Kerala, and Karnataka reveals trends and the impact of government measures on virus control.

name: Web Scraping
desc: In this project, I use web scraping to gather data from online sources, then analyze it to uncover patterns and insights for business intelligence and market research.

name: Scraping of Live Website (TimesJob)
desc: I Scraped a live web sides to get the details like profile,description,Job role&Keyskills of all jobs related to python in Data Frame .

name: Linear Programming Problem (LPP)
desc: Linear Programming is a method to optimize outcomes under constraints, commonly used in operations research to find the best solution within limits like resources, time, and costs.

name: Expense Tracker App
desc: Welcome to the Expense Tracker This web app helps users manage their finances by tracking expenses using HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript & Django.
